name: HTMLVideoElement
description: The HTMLVideoElement interface provides special properties and methods for manipulating video objects. It also inherits properties and methods of HTMLMediaElement and HTMLElement.

members.name: HTMLVideoElement.height
members.description: Is a DOMString that reflects the height HTML attribute, which specifies the height of the display area, in CSS pixels.

members.name: HTMLVideoElement.poster
members.description: Is a DOMString that reflects the poster HTML attribute, which specifies an image to show while no video data is available.

members.name: HTMLVideoElement.videoHeight
members.description: Returns an unsigned long containing the intrinsic height of the resource in CSS pixels, taking into account the dimensions, aspect ratio, clean aperture, resolution, and so forth, as defined for the format used by the resource. If the element's ready state is HAVE_NOTHING, the value is 0.

members.name: HTMLVideoElement.videoWidth
members.description: Returns an unsigned long containing the intrinsic width of the resource in CSS pixels, taking into account the dimensions, aspect ratio, clean aperture, resolution, and so forth, as defined for the format used by the resource. If the element's ready state is HAVE_NOTHING, the value is 0.

members.name: HTMLVideoElement.width
members.description: Is a DOMString that reflects the width HTML attribute, which specifies the width of the display area, in CSS pixels.

members.name: HTMLVideoElement.mozParsedFrames
members.description: Returns an unsigned long with the count of video frames that have been parsed from the media resource.

members.name: HTMLVideoElement.mozDecodedFrames
members.description: Returns an unsigned long with the count of parsed video frames that have been decoded into images.

members.name: HTMLVideoElement.mozPresentedFrames
members.description: Returns an unsigned long with the count of decoded frames that have been presented to the rendering pipeline for painting.

members.name: HTMLVideoElement.mozPaintedFrames
members.description: Returns an unsigned long with the count of presented frames which were painted on the screen.

members.name: HTMLVideoElement.mozFrameDelay
members.description: Returns an double with the time which the last painted video frame was late by, in seconds.

members.name: HTMLVideoElement.mozHasAudio
members.description: Returns a Boolean indicating if there is some audio associated with the video.

members.name: HTMLVideoElement.getVideoPlaybackQuality()
members.description: Returns a VideoPlaybackQuality objects that contains the current playback metrics.
